idea: Indian homes are getting more theme based with more people choosing to keep an exciting and unique ambiance. Cocovey Homes has made an effort to perceive that excitement and has tried to bring exclusive home décor designs for Indian homes. We believe in delivering high quality products to all our valuable customers and help them to choose their favorites from a wide range of such painstakingly pursued beautiful home decor items. As these products find their way from the skilled hands of craftsmen directly to that precious place in your abode, we at Cocovey Homes assure you the durability and quality of these products.
name: COCOVEY HOMES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Company undertaking interior designing contracts for corporate sector
name: DEXTEROUS STUDIO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Zavi Designs is a start-up out of India with its own organic & sustainable Fashion Brand for men & women named "ZAVI" (www.shop-zavi.com) that has been launched globally in September 2019. Our mission as a company is to counter the fast fashion trends and its impact on the environment by making our clothing based on the following values of sustainable & environmentally friendly, desirable designs & affordable pricing.
name: ZAVI DESIGNS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Credmatics platform aims at allowing companies to finance their supply chain by issuing notes to sell their receivables to potential Buyers or Banks. Its multibuyer /multibank funding model appeals to a growing number of companies that don’t want to rely on a single source or want to be able to easily add and change funding providers, depending on their needs. Clients shall praise Credmatics for its ease of enrollment, which is important for any SCF program in terms of supplier uptake.
name: FINZEST SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are commercially live with our pizza and dessert solution. We currently serve about 350+ customers serving 800 points of sale throughout the country.We are currently under R & D for our Asian foods solution with a target to commercially launch this in the next 4-5 months.
